en.applicant: I, kris karystgj of 54 grosvernor road ilford london ig4 6yh essex, make the following statement:
en.deceased: andrew drimitry was born on 1 January 1930 and died on 1 January 2019, domiciled in England and Wales.

executorsApplying.name: I am an executor named in the will as kris karystgj, and I am applying for probate.
executorsApplying.sign: I will send to the probate registry what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament of andrew drimitry.

en.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £20000.00 and the net value for the estate amounts to £10000.00.
en.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in andrew drimitry which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of andrew drimitry and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
en.intro: This statement is based on the information you’ve given in your application. It will be stored as a public record.

cy.applicant: Rwyf i, kris karystgj o 54 grosvernor road ilford london ig4 6yh essex, yn gwneud y datganiad canlynol:
cy.deceased: andrew drimitry ar undefined a bu farw ar undefined, ac roedd fel arfer yn preswylio yng Nghymru a Lloegr.

executorsApplying.name: Rwy’n ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys fel kris karystgj, ac rwy’n gwneud cais am brofiant.
executorsApplying.sign: Byddaf yn anfon i’r Gofrestrfa Brofiant yr hyn a gredaf i fod yn ewyllys a thestament gwir a gwreiddiol olaf andrew drimitry.

cy.deceasedEstateValue: Mae gwerth gros yr ystad yn £20000.00 ac mae gwerth net yr ystad yn £10000.00.
cy.deceasedEstateLand: Hyd eithaf fy ngwybodaeth a’m cred, nid oedd unrhyw dir wedi’i freinio yn andrew drimitry a setlwyd cyn marwolaeth (ac nid drwy ewyllys) andrew drimitry ac a oedd dal yn dir a setlwyd er gwaethaf y farwolaeth honno.
cy.intro: Mae’r datganiad hwn wedi’i seilio ar yr wybodaeth rydych wedi’i rhoi yn eich cais. Bydd yn cael ei storio fel cofnod cyhoeddus.

en.confirm: I confirm that I will administer the estate of andrew drimitry, according to law. I will:
en.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
en.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
en.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
en.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
en.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
en.understandItem1: my application will be rejected if I do not answer any questions about the information I have given
en.understandItem2: proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against the undersigned if it is found that the evidence provided is deliberately untruthful or dishonest, as well as revocation of the grant
en.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
en.submitWarning: Once you click ‘Save and continue’, you cannot change your answers.

cy.confirm: Rwy’n cadarnhau y byddaf yn gweinyddu ystad andrew drimitry, yn unol â’r gyfraith. Byddaf yn:
cy.confirmItem3: cadw cofnod llawn o’r ffordd y mae’r ystad wedi cael ei gweinyddu
cy.requests: Os bydd y gofrestrfa brofiant (y llys) yn gofyn i mi, byddaf yn:
cy.requestsItem1: darparu manylion llawn yr ystad a’r ffordd y cafodd ei gweinyddu
cy.requestsItem2: dychwelyd y grant profiant i’r llys
cy.understandItem1: y bydd fy nghais yn cael ei wrthod os na fyddaf yn ateb unrhyw gwestiynau am yr wybodaeth rwyf wedi’i rhoi
cy.understandItem2: y gellir dwyn achos dirmyg llys yn erbyn y sawl sydd wedi llofnodi isod os penderfynir bod y dystiolaeth a ddarparwyd yn anwir neu’n anonest yn fwriadol, yn ogystal â diddymu’r grant
cy.accept: Rwy’n cadarnhau y byddaf yn gweinyddu ystad yr unigolyn sydd wedi marw yn unol â’r gyfraith, a bod fy  nghais yn gywir.
cy.submitWarning: Unwaith y byddwch wedi clicio ‘Arbed a pharhau’, ni allwch newid eich atebion.

checkAnswersSummary.mainParagraph: Check the information below carefully. This will form a record of your application for probate. It will also be stored as a public record, and will be able to be viewed online.

headers: In the High Court of Justice

declarationItems.title: I, kris karystgj of 54 grosvernor road ilford london ig4 6yh essex, make the following statement:
andrew drimitry was born on 1 January 1930 and died on 1 January 2019, domiciled in England and Wales.

sections.title: The estate of the person who died

declarationItems.title: The gross value for the estate amounts to £20000.00 and the net value for the estate amounts to £10000.00.

To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in andrew drimitry which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of andrew drimitry and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
I am an executor named in the will as kris karystgj, and I am applying for probate.
I will send to the probate registry what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament of andrew drimitry.
I confirm that I will administer the estate of andrew drimitry, according to law. I will:
values: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
keep a full account of how the estate has been administered

declarationItems.title: If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
values: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
return the grant of probate to the court

declarationItems.title: I understand that:
values: my application will be rejected if I do not answer any questions about the information I have given
proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against the undersigned if it is found that the evidence provided is deliberately untruthful or dishonest, as well as revocation of the grant
